description: Non-essential shops and community spaces will close and public gatherings will be banned.
title: Coronavirus: Guernsey residents told to 'stay at home'
title_page: Coronavirus: Guernsey residents told to 'stay at home' - BBC News
maintext: "I cannot stress this enough - if there really are any sceptics out there, even they, surely, have now grasped the importance of everyone doing what we have been saying - namely, you must follow public health advice."
